page.title: 18HOUSEHOLD MACHINES (SURVEY)
page.content:
WE ASKED 28 FAMILIES TO SAY WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING MACHINES THEY OWN.(D.A.)
ITEM | YES | NO | -------------------------------------- FREEZER OR FRIDGE/FREEZER | 25 | 3 | DISHWASHER | 1 | 27 | COLOUR TELEVISION | 28 | 0 | VIDEO RECORDER | 15 | 13 | MICROWAVE OVEN | 4 | 24 | MICRO COMPUTER | 12 | 16 | FOOD MIXER (ELECTRIC) | 20 | 8 | TUMBLE DRIER | 16 | 12 | PORTABLE CASSETTE PLAYER | 20 | 8 | ELECTRIC WASHING MACHINE | 28 | 0 | ELECTRIC CARVING KNIFE | 8 | 20 | COMPACT DISC PLAYER | 4 | 24 | HI-FI. MUSIC SYSTEM | 19 | 9 | COFFEE PERCOLATOR | 16 | 12 | TOOTH BRUSH (ELECTRIC) | 2 | 26 | TOASTED SANDWICH MAKER | 11 | 17 | --------------------------------------
